participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Friendly, community-oriented, and passionate about cooking and fitness.
participant_1.background: I'm an avid cook and weight lifter. I have two passions: challenging myself and volunteering with my son's Boy Scout troop. I haven’t had to work a day in my life. I love listening to chillstep while I do my yoga in the morning. I grow the tallest sunflowers you've ever seen.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.background: I would like to be reincarnated as someone who is loved by my family and is successful in their career. I won the spelling bee in third grade. I treasure the time I spend with my dog, George. I'm single, but my friends are like my family. My master's degree is in Italian literature.

content.text: I'm a volunteer with my son's Boy Scout troop.
That's awesome! I'm single, but my friends are like family to me.
I grow the tallest sunflowers you've ever seen.
That's incredible! I won the spelling bee in third grade.
I haven't had to work a day in my life.
I'm an avid cook and weight lifter.
I love listening to chillstep while I do yoga in the morning.
I have a master's degree in Italian literature.
I would like to be reincarnated as someone who is loved by their family and is successful in their career.
That's a great goal! I hope you achieve it!
